Detailed Description

Basic exception class.

This is a basic exception class of the library. All other exception classes are derived from it.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ting::Socket::Exc::Exc ( const std::string &  message = std::string()  )  [inline]

Exception constructor.

Parameters:
message Pointer to the exception message null-terminated string. Constructor will copy the string into objects internal memory buffer.
